dev.nokee.utils

Class DeferUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.nokee.utils.DeferUtils

  • public final class DeferUtils
extends Object
    Defer realization in the context of Gradle using various tricks.

    • Method Summary

      Returns an Object instance that realize the specified supplier only when calling Object#toString().

    • Method Detail

      • asToStringObject

        public static Object asToStringObject(Supplier<String> supplier)
        Returns an Object instance that realize the specified supplier only when calling Object#toString().
        Parameters:
        supplier - a supplier of String to realize during Object#toString()
        Returns:
        an Object instance realizing the specified supplier when calling Object#toString(), never null.

      • executes

        public static <S> Provider<List<S>> executes(Runnable delegate)
        Returns a Provider instance that runs the specified Runnable when resolved. The provider always run the Runnable and return an empty list.
        Type Parameters:
        S - the element type of returned list
        Parameters:
        delegate - a runnable to run upon resolving the provider.
        Returns:
        a provider that runs the specified runnable and return a empty list, never null.
